author: JamesWTruher
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

```powershell
PS> curl http://zip.zap.zop/zup?zep                                                                                                         

```

Expected behavior
-----------------
`http://zip.zap.zop/zup?zep` is passed to curl

Actual behavior
---------------

```none
Cannot find drive. A drive with the name 'http' does not exist.
At line:1 char:1
+ curl http://zip.zap.zop/zup?zep
+ ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
    + CategoryInfo          : ObjectNotFound: (http:String) [], DriveNotFoundException
    + FullyQualifiedErrorId : DriveNotFound
 

```

Environment data
----------------

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable
```
